snippet.title: Shady Part of Me - Launch Trailer | The Game Awards 2020
snippet.description:
Get it now: https://www.focus-home.com/games/shady-part-of-me?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=LaunchTrailer#shop
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ShadyPartOfMe
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/shadypartofme

Shady Part Of Me - A unique emotional journey now available with a world premiere trailer for The Game Awards 2020

Focus Home Interactive and Douze-Dixièmes are delighted to announce today’s release of Shady Part of Me, an emotional and dream-like journey, with breathtaking artistic direction and the enthralling voice of Hannah Murray (Game of Thrones, Skins). Discover the Launch Trailer showcased during The Game Awards 2020, and overcome emotional struggles through surreal dreamscapes where a little girl and her shadow must learn, cooperate, and evolve to progress in a poetic journey. Shady Part of Me is now available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and PC.

Dream or reality?

During your adventure, alternate at any time between the little girl and her shadow in an elegant mix of 3D and 2D gameplay. Both must learn, cooperate and evolve to progress in a poetic journey. Don’t fear failure, face any situation with the ability to turn back time at any moment.

Shady Part of Me is available today for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC.  Enjoy an exclusive 10% discount on all platforms until December 24th. For more information, visit the official website.
